# Music Videos

This music video is the opening song from my a cappella team's award winning 2022-2023 set. This particular song is called 'Adiye/Youth' and is a blend of the Tamil song 'Adiye' and the English song 'Youth.' My a cappella group also recently released a new EP titled 'Azira.' If you are interested, go check it out on Youtube, Spotify, or Apple Music!
